price: Namoonni Qiyaamaa irraa si gaafatu “Dhugumatti, beekumsi ishee Rabbuma bira jira” jedhiin. Maaltu si beeksise? Qiyaamaan dhihoo ta’uun ni malaa.
arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُكَ ٱلنَّاسُ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِۖ قُلۡ إِنَّمَا عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ تَكُونُ قَرِيبًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yasaluka al-nāsu ʿani al-sāʿati qul innamā ʿil'muhā ʿinda al-lahi wamā yud'rīka laʿalla al-sāʿata takūnu qarīban
